summary: Make buttocks and a thigh of CBBEv3 Body big more.
descriptionHtml:
- CBBEv3M Body -
				by MAK

 *** Apology ***
I am a Japanese, and English ability is low.
You may be hard to read my sentence.
I\'m sorry.
Still thank you for intending to read till the last!


 *** Contents of this MOD ***
Do you want that you make your women bigger buttocks?
This MOD changes the figure of the woman to buttocks and the thigh which are bigger than CBBEv3 original.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
For MOD mentioned above, this figure was made.


 *** Necessary MOD ***
[ Caliente Female Body Mod BBE v3 ] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666


 *** Installation ***
After having introduced original CBBEv3, please overwrite in this MOD.


 *** Matters that require attention ***
I do not know whether Body slide which Mr. Caliente prepared in option is available.


 *** Credits ***
Thank you for Caliente!
I strongly thank for his having admitted distribution of this MOD.

[ Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- ] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666



--- Answer to common question ---
Q. What does hairstyle MOD use?

A. Hairstyle MOD is
[ Tera Hair Weight Fix version ]
Because it is not a file uploaded in Nexus, please search it.


Q. What does face MOD use?

A. Face MOD is
[ RANs HeadMesh Variants by RAN46 ]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127

[ RANs Eyeliner Replacer by RAN46 ]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701

[ envision Face by DD AKT ]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7897
